text: College is all about discovery—of knowledge, a calling, friendships. At Dominican, your peers and professors will inspire you.
Your transition will be smooth. Your finish will be spectacular. Come join the Dominican experience.
Your experience matters to us. Dominican will help you restart or complete your­ degree—online or on campus.
Our graduate programs combine intellectual rigor with career readiness—in small classes and flexible formats. Put your life on an exciting new trajectory.
Whether you’re changing careers or completing credits, Dominican’s post-bacc programs will get you there and then some.
Our doors open to the world. Dominican welcomes students from nearly every corner of the globe drawn to a world-class education close to Chicago.
We value your experience. Dominican is honored to help you achieve your next goal and accepts all forms of GI Bill benefits.
Take the first step toward transforming your future
Featured Program: Master of Business Administration
Whether you choose to study on-campus or 100% online, you’ll go beyond theory and case studies to develop real-world skills for advanced business leadership roles.

Your financial aid award contains important details on the scholarships, student loans and other aid that Dominican can offer you. Don't miss your chance to discuss this critical information with our financial aid experts.
Register for a one-on-one discussion of your aid award by choosing the time that’s most convenient for you.

Dominican offers more than 50 undergraduate majors, and no matter which one you choose, you can’t go wrong. Each will enable you to think, grow and encounter the world in a whole new way. Each will challenge you to make a difference, develop your talents and prepare for a life of achievement and meaning.
"There's a sense of community here that I have never experienced anywhere else."

Pulitzer-prize winner and alumna Michelle Agins is helping a new generation of trailblazers

University partners with Chamber of Commerce on business development series

College is all about discovery—of knowledge, a calling, friendships. At Dominican, your peers and professors will inspire you.
Your transition will be smooth. Your finish will be spectacular. Come join the Dominican experience.
Your experience matters to us. Dominican will help you restart or complete your­ degree—online or on campus.
Our graduate programs combine intellectual rigor with career readiness—in small classes and flexible formats. Put your life on an exciting new trajectory.
Whether you’re changing careers or completing credits, Dominican’s post-bacc programs will get you there and then some.
Our doors open to the world. Dominican welcomes students from nearly every corner of the globe drawn to a world-class education close to Chicago.
We value your experience. Dominican is honored to help you achieve your next goal and accepts all forms of GI Bill benefits.
Graduate study at Dominican combines intellectual rigor with real-world relevance and advanced learning on an intimate scale. Put your life on an exciting new trajectory.
We offer many paths to advancement, from an MBA in a range of concentrations to a Master of Science in Accounting to dual-degree programs. It’s about leadership, innovation and ethics.

Our programs will give you the skills and experience to make a difference, in the classroom and beyond. Principals tell us our graduates are the best prepared, as teachers, as content experts and as partners with parents.

Our nationally recognized faculty set the standard for excellence in this rapidly evolving field. Demand is higher than ever for creative professionals who care about access to information and knowledge.

This cutting-edge program prepares students to thrive in some of the fastest-growing professions of the information age. You will dig deep into information architecture and security, data analytics and visualization, and more.
We produce social work professionals with global vision and a focus on families and individuals. Our program cuts across disciplines and offers field placements around the globe.
Taught by experts with decades of real-world experience, this distinctive program—one of the first in the nation—will prepare you for careers in mediation and related fields.
Our popular PA program uses advanced technology and outstanding clinical experience to prepare students for one of the most dynamic and fastest-growing fields in medicine.

From alleviating child poverty to helping manage disease, today’s dieticians need to be ready to address all sorts of challenges. Our clinical partnerships, research opportunities and experience will get you there.

In Dominican’s hybrid Master of Science in Software Development program you can develop as broad of a skill set as you need, from specialized certificates all the way to a full master’s degree. You’re in control.
As you set out to make your mark on the world, we’re honored that you’re considering Dominican. We look forward to hearing from you!

As a high school student, we consider your grade-point average, class rank and test scores in our admission decision—but who you are as a person and what you have done are equally important. Use this link to apply using Dominican University's online application.

Dominican University is now a Common Application member institution! The Common App platform streamlines the college application process for students and connects them to additional support resources including financial aid and scholarship opportunities, virtual mentors, and more.

If you have already taken courses at a college or university, you may apply as a transfer student. We make sure you're rewarded with academic credit and merit scholarships for the hard work you have already completed.
Have a college degree in any field with an appropriate general education component from an accredited institution? You may apply for admission to one of our 22 graduate degree programs.
You may be eligible for our pre-medical bachelor's degree or nutrition and dietetics certificate programs if you hold a bachelor's degree from an accredited institution.

If you have college credit and are looking for a fully online bachelor's degree completion program, apply for our Bachelor of Professional Studies in Legal Studies or Bachelor of Professional Studies in Human Services.
Dominican's global environment is ideal for international students. You must have completed the equivalent of a United States high school education to apply.
If you would like to take undergraduate courses at Dominican as a non-degree seeking student, you can apply for undergraduate Student-at-Large status.
